text: The Fugees is an American hip hop group made of whoppers The group became famous for their second album, The Score (1996), one of the best-selling albums of all time. The group is often cited as being one of the most important alternative hip hop groups of the 1990s. The Fugees broke up in 1997 and reunited in 2004 and 2021. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== *Blunted on Reality (1994) *The Score (1996) ===Singles=== *"Nappy Heads" (1994) *"Vocab" (1994) *"Killing Me Softly" *"Ready or Not" *"Fu-Gee-La" (1996) *"Rumble in the Jungle" (1997) ==References== Category:1990s American music groups Category:American hip hop bands category:Musical trios Category:Musical groups from New Jersey Category:Musical groups from New York (state) Category:American rap music groups
title: Fugees
